Definition_e: The station has been declared as closed by the responsible supervising organization
The station is considered non-operational/non-reporting temporarily, but is expected to resume its operations/reporting after the temporary suspension
The station fully complies with the reporting obligations of the observation programme/network concerned
The station partially complies with the reporting obligations of the observation programme/network concerned
The station is planned to be deployed sometime in the future, and all information
The station is deployed and producing data but still not fully ready to start reporting operationally
